derivation: or (masculine) (שִׁבְעָה); from H7650 (שָׁבַע); a primitive cardinal number;
outline:
1. seven (cardinal number)
    1. as ordinal number
    2. in combination - 17, 700 etc
strongs_def: seven (as the sacred full one); also (adverbially) seven times; by implication, a week; by extension, an indefinite number
